fact.description: The match is underway at Estadio Nacional de Brasilia .
Nicola Rizzoli signals a free kick to Belgium in their own half.
Argentina to take a throw-in in Belgium territory.
Nicola Rizzoli signals a Argentina throw-in in Belgium's half.
Argentina drive upfield and Angel Di Maria gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Belgium defender.
Can Belgium get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Argentina's half?
Nicola Rizzoli awards Argentina a goal kick.
Throw-in Belgium.
Free kick Argentina.
Angel Di Maria (Argentina) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Belgium have a goal kick.
Angel Di Maria with an assist there.
Throw-in for Belgium in their own half.
Can Belgium get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Argentina's half?
Belgium have a dangerous throw-in.
Nicola Rizzoli signals a Belgium throw-in in Argentina's half.
Ball goes out of play for a Argentina goal kick.
Argentina to take a throw-in in Belgium territory.
Ezequiel Lavezzi (Argentina) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Kevin De Bruyne of Belgium gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Argentina at Estadio Nacional de Brasilia .
Throw-in for Argentina at Estadio Nacional de Brasilia .
Belgium have been awarded a corner by Nicola Rizzoli.
Free kick Argentina.
Corner awarded to Belgium.
Belgium's Vincent Kompany attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Argentina goal kick.
Belgium awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal kick for Argentina at Estadio Nacional de Brasilia .
Belgium to take a throw-in in Argentina territory.
In Brasilia Belgium's Marouane Fellaini is caught offside.
Nicola Rizzoli blows against Belgium's Divock Origi for offside.
Nicola Rizzoli signals a free kick to Belgium.
In Brasilia Belgium drive forward through Kevin De Bruyne. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Can Belgium capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Argentina's half?
Angel Di Maria (Argentina) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Argentina have a goal kick.
The match at Estadio Nacional de Brasilia has been interrupted briefly for a check on Angel Di Maria, who is down injured.
Play is underway once more.
Angel Di Maria returns to the field for Argentina after picking up a slight injury.
Belgium awarded a free kick in their own half.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Brasilia to check on Angel Di Maria, who is grimacing with pain.
Play has been resumed.
Alejandro Sabella (Argentina) is making a first change, with Enzo Perez replacing the possibly injured Angel Di Maria.
Nicola Rizzoli signals a free kick to Argentina in their own half.
Argentina awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Argentina get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Belgium's half?
Nicola Rizzoli signals a Argentina throw-in in Belgium's half.
Ball safe as Argentina is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Nicola Rizzoli signals a free kick to Argentina.
Argentina are pushing forward but Lionel Messi's finish is wide of the goal.
Nicola Rizzoli awards Belgium a goal kick.
Nicola Rizzoli signals a throw-in for Belgium, close to Argentina's area.
In Brasilia, Kevin Mirallas (Belgium) misses the target with a header.
Nicola Rizzoli awards Argentina a goal kick.
Throw-in for Argentina close to the penalty box.
Argentina have been awarded a corner by Nicola Rizzoli.
Can Belgium get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Argentina's half?
Belgium awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The first-half is over at Estadio Nacional de Brasilia .
Belgium to take a throw-in in Argentina territory.
Ball safe as Argentina is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the first half.
Free kick Argentina.
Argentina's Lionel Messi gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Belgium have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Argentina at Estadio Nacional de Brasilia .
Throw-in for Belgium in their own half.
Argentina needs to be cautious. Belgium have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in Argentina.
Argentina awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Nicola Rizzoli signals a Argentina throw-in in Belgium's half.
Gonzalo Higuain (Argentina) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Argentina.
Ball safe as Belgium is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Belgium will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Argentina.
Belgium's Eden Hazard has been booked in Brasilia.
Argentina have been awarded a corner by Nicola Rizzoli.
Argentina apply pressure and a brilliant scoring opportunity is created for Gonzalo Higuain. But the ball crashes against the crossbar!

Nicola Rizzoli signals a Belgium throw-in in Argentina's half.
Nicola Rizzoli signals a throw-in for Belgium, close to Argentina's area.
Throw-in for Belgium at Estadio Nacional de Brasilia .
Can Belgium get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Argentina's half?
Argentina to take a throw-in in Belgium territory.
Romelu Lukaku is on a sub for Divock Origi for Belgium.
Belgium make their second substitution with Dries Mertens replacing Kevin Mirallas.
Attention is being given to Argentina’s Ezequiel Lavezzi and play has been suspended briefly.
The match is underway again.
Argentina's Ezequiel Lavezzi looks ok and returns to the pitch.

Belgium attack but Marouane Fellaini's header doesn't find the target.

Toby Alderweireld (Belgium) has been given a yellow card and will be suspended from the next match.
Can Argentina get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Belgium's half?
Argentina to take a throw-in in Belgium territory.
Alejandro Sabella (Argentina) has taken off Ezequiel Lavezzi who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Rodrigo Sebastian Palacio is the replacement.

Throw-in for Belgium close to the penalty box.

Full-time! The final score is 1-0.
